resources.string: Nutella Pie: 2 CUP Graham Cracker crumbs,6 TBLSP unsalted butter, melted,0.5 CUP granulated sugar,1.5 TSP salt,5 TBLSP vanilla,1 KNutella or other chocolate-hazelnut spread,500 G Mascapone Cheese(room temperature),1 CUP heavy cream(cold),4 OZ cream cheese(softened)

Brownies: 350 G Bittersweet chocolate (60-70% cacao), 226 G unsalted butter, 300 G granulated suger,100 G light brown sugar, 5 UNIT large eggs,1 TBLSP vanilla extract, 140 G all purpose flour, 40 G cocoa powder, 1.5 G swmisweet chocolate chips

Yellow Cake: 400 G sifted cake flour, 700 G franulated sugar, 4 TSP salt, 2 TBLSP vanilla extract, 8 UNIT egg yolks, 323 G whole milk, 961 G unsalted butter, 6 UNIT egg whites, 283 G melted and cooled vittersweet

string-array.name: reci
string-array.item: Nutella Pie:\n2 CUP Graham Cracker crumbs,6 TBLSP unsalted butter, melted,0.5 CUP granulated sugar,1.5 TSP salt,5 TBLSP vanilla,1 KNutella or other chocolate-hazelnut spread,500 G Mascapone Cheese(room temperature),1 CUP heavy cream(cold),4 OZ cream cheese(softened)

Brownies:\n350 G Bittersweet chocolate (60-70% cacao), 226 G unsalted butter, 300 G granulated suger,100 G light brown sugar, 5 UNIT large eggs,1 TBLSP vanilla extract, 140 G all purpose flour, 40 G cocoa powder, 1.5 G swmisweet chocolate chips

Yellow Cake:\n400 G sifted cake flour, 700 G franulated sugar, 4 TSP salt, 2 TBLSP vanilla extract, 8 UNIT egg yolks, 323 G whole milk, 961 G unsalted butter, 6 UNIT egg whites, 283 G melted and cooled vittersweet

Cheesecake:\n2 CUP Graham Cracker crumbs, 6 TBLSP unsalted butter, 250 G granulated sugar, 1 TSP salt, 4 TSP vanilla,680 G cream cheese, 3 UNIT large whole egges, 2 UNIT large egg yolks, 250 G heacy cream
